synopsis.text: Hokkaido serves as the backdrop for this captivating anime, where three friends navigate the tumultuous waters of academics, adolescence, and affection. After bidding farewell to middle school, Takuya Amano, voiced by Kouki Uchiyama, embarks on a new journey to Hokkaido. Alongside him, we find Haruka Kishi, his childhood companion brought to life by Yui Ishikawa, and Tsubasa Miyake, a shared friend attending the prestigious Eikoh Seminar school, voiced by Daisuke Fujita. As they grapple with the pressures of impending exams and the complexities of their relationships, the trio's story unfolds in a heartwarming and relatable narrative. This engaging collaboration between Z-Kai Group, loundraw, and FLAT STUDIO promises to resonate with viewers, offering a poignant reminder of our shared experiences with school and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
